mapper.sql: id, formid, materialid, supplier, operator, opttime, amount, itemprice, audittime, auditor, orderprice, auditstatus, planitemid,totalpay,totalre,totalin,totalch,deliverydate,remark
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) ordernum,SUM(totalin) totalin,SUM(totalpay) totalpay FROM t_erp_purchase_form_entry e LEFT JOIN t_erp_purchase_form f ON f.id=e.formid WHERE e.supplier=#{supplier,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND e.auditstatus=3
select ifnull(count(1),0) from t_erp_purchase_form_entry e left join t_erp_purchase_form f on e.formid=f.id where e.auditstatus=2 and f.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and e.inwhstatus=0
select ifnull(count(1),0) from t_erp_purchase_form_entry e left join t_erp_purchase_form f on e.formid=f.id where e.auditstatus=2 and f.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and e.paystatus=0

select entry.id,IFNULL(pic.location,pic.url) image,m.sku,m.color,m.name mname, entry.auditstatus,entry.supplier,c.name suppliername, entry.itemprice,entry.amount,entry.orderprice, mark.mark notice,m.MOQ, IFNULL(sc.stockingCycle,w.stocking_cycle) stockingCycle from t_erp_purchase_form_entry entry left join t_erp_material m on entry.materialid=m.id left join t_picture pic on m.image=pic.id left join t_erp_purchase_form form on entry.formid=form.id left join t_erp_customer c on c.id=entry.supplier left join t_erp_warehouse w on w.id=form.warehouseid left join t_erp_stockcycle sc on w.id=sc.warehouseid and m.id=sc.materialid left join t_erp_material_mark mark on mark.materialid=m.id and mark.ftype='notice' where form.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR}
and entry.formid=#{formid,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT t.shopid FROM t_erp_purchase_form t LEFT JOIN t_erp_purchase_form_entry e ON t.id=e.formid WHERE e.inwhstatus=0 AND e.deliverydate < CURDATE() AND e.auditstatus=2 AND e.deliverydate>DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -60 DAY ) GROUP BY t.shopid

SELECT m.sku,t.number,COUNT(t.shopid) num,e.deliverydate FROM t_erp_purchase_form t LEFT JOIN t_erp_purchase_form_entry e ON t.id=e.formid LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.id=e.materialid WHERE e.inwhstatus=0 AND e.deliverydate < CURDATE() AND e.totalpay>0 AND e.deliverydate>DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -60 DAY ) and t.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT e.* FROM t_erp_purchase_form t LEFT JOIN t_erp_purchase_form_entry e ON t.id=e.formid left join t_erp_material m on m.id=e.materialid WHERE t.number=#{number,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and m.sku=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR}
